pausedReason: site is paused for srawlling problem

navigationUrls: (async (page) => { const collectedUrls = []; const navLinks = await page.$$('.navigation__link.has-submenu-navigation-link.js-next-menu.js-nav-link'); for (const navLink of navLinks) { await navLink.hover(); await page.waitForSelector('.navigation__submenu__item__link', { timeout: 2000 }).catch(() => {}); const submenuUrls = await page.$$eval('.navigation__submenu__item__link', links => links.map(link => link.href)); collectedUrls.push(...submenuUrls); await page.waitForTimeout(500); } return collectedUrls; })

(async (page) => { const collectedUrls = []; const navLinks = await page.$$('.main-menu-top li'); for (const navLink of navLinks) { await navLink.hover(); await page.waitForSelector('a', { timeout: 2000 }).catch(() => {}); const submenuUrls = await page.$$eval('a', links => links.map(link => link.href)); collectedUrls.push(...submenuUrls); await page.waitForTimeout(500); } return collectedUrls; })
